recipes.title: Paneer Butter Masala
recipes.description: Creamy tomato-based curry with soft cubes of paneer.
steps: Heat butter in a pan and sauté onions until golden.
Add ginger-garlic paste and cook for 2 minutes.
Add tomatoes, turmeric, chili powder and cook until soft.
Blend into a smooth paste and return to pan.
Add paneer cubes and cream, simmer for 5 minutes.
Garnish with coriander.
recipes.author: Chef Raj

recipes.title: Chole (Chickpea Curry)
recipes.description: Spicy and tangy chickpea curry from North India.
steps: Soak chickpeas overnight and boil until tender.
Heat oil and add cumin seeds, then onions.
Add ginger-garlic paste and sauté.
Add tomatoes, turmeric, chole masala, and cook to a paste.
Add boiled chickpeas and simmer for 10 minutes.
Garnish with coriander.
recipes.author: Chef Priya

recipes.title: Masala Dosa
recipes.description: Crispy South Indian rice crepes stuffed with spiced potato filling.
steps: Soak rice and dal overnight and grind into a smooth batter.
Ferment the batter for 8 hours.
Prepare potato filling with onion, green chili, mustard seeds, curry leaves.
Heat a pan, pour batter to make a thin crepe.
Place filling, fold dosa, cook until golden.
recipes.author: Chef Anil

recipes.title: Butter Naan
recipes.description: Soft and fluffy Indian flatbread baked with butter.
steps: Mix flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, sugar, and yogurt into dough.
Knead for 10 minutes and let it rest for 1 hour.
Roll dough into small rounds.
Cook on hot tawa, brush with butter.
recipes.author: Chef Meera

recipes.title: Aloo Gobi
recipes.description: Spiced Indian potato and cauliflower curry.
steps: Heat oil and add cumin seeds and onion.
Add ginger-garlic paste, tomatoes, turmeric, chili powder.
Add potatoes and cauliflower, cook covered until tender.
Add garam masala and garnish with coriander.
recipes.author: Chef Neha

recipes.title: Rajma Masala
recipes.description: Red kidney bean curry with rich spices, popular in North India.
steps: Soak rajma overnight and boil until soft.
Heat oil, sauté onions and ginger-garlic paste.
Add tomatoes, turmeric, chili powder, cook to paste.
Add rajma and simmer 15 minutes.
Add garam masala and garnish.
recipes.author: Chef Ravi

recipes.title: Chicken Biryani
recipes.description: Fragrant layered rice dish with marinated chicken and spices.
steps: Marinate chicken with yogurt, spices, and salt for 2 hours.
Fry onions until golden, add tomatoes, cook to soft paste.
Add chicken and cook until 70% done.
Boil rice separately with salt and saffron.
Layer chicken and rice, cover, and cook on low heat 20 minutes.
Garnish with mint and coriander.
recipes.author: Chef Arjun

recipes.title: Palak Paneer
recipes.description: Spinach and paneer cooked with aromatic spices.
steps: Blanch spinach and blend into a puree.
Heat oil, add cumin seeds and onions.
Add ginger-garlic paste and tomatoes.
Add spices and spinach puree.
Add paneer cubes, simmer 5 minutes.
Optional: add cream.
recipes.author: Chef Suman
